com.artisan.push

Class ArtisanPushNotificationSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artisan.push.ArtisanPushNotificationSettings

  • public class ArtisanPushNotificationSettings
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArtisanPushNotificationSettings()
      Create an empty Artisan Push Notification Settings.
      ArtisanPushNotificationSettings(java.lang.String pushSenderId)
      Provide Artisan with your Push Sender ID.
      ArtisanPushNotificationSettings(java.lang.String pushSenderId, ArtisanNotificationBuilder builder)
      Provide Artisan with your Push Sender ID and a notification builder to provide defaults for your app's notifications.

      By setting a push sender Id you are implicitly enabling Artisan Push Messaging.

      Important: If you do not provide a small icon for your notifications via the builder we will default to using your app icon.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArtisanPushNotificationSettings

        public ArtisanPushNotificationSettings()
        Create an empty Artisan Push Notification Settings. By default push is disabled. Artisan will not request push token or even load classes related to Google Play Services if push is disabled.

      • ArtisanPushNotificationSettings

        public ArtisanPushNotificationSettings(java.lang.String pushSenderId)
        Provide Artisan with your Push Sender ID. This is your Google API Project Number.

        You get your project number when you set up a project at https://console.developers.google.com/project By setting a push sender Id you are implicitly enabling Artisan Push Messaging.

      • ArtisanPushNotificationSettings

        public ArtisanPushNotificationSettings(java.lang.String pushSenderId,
                               ArtisanNotificationBuilder builder)
        Provide Artisan with your Push Sender ID and a notification builder to provide defaults for your app's notifications.

        By setting a push sender Id you are implicitly enabling Artisan Push Messaging.

        Important: If you do not provide a small icon for your notifications via the builder we will default to using your app icon. This may look odd if your app is targeting API 21+ because the OS will take only the alpha of the icon and display that on a neutral background. If your app is set to target API 21+ we strongly recommend that you take advantage of the ArtisanPushNotificationSettings API.
        Parameters:
        pushSenderId - Your Push Sender Id is your Google API Project Number. You get your project number when you set up a project at https://console.developers.google.com/project
        builder - by providing an ArtisanNotificationBuilder you can provide defaults for your app's notifications for Artisan Push Messages, like the small icon

    • Method Detail

      • isPushEnabledAndSenderIdSet

        public boolean isPushEnabledAndSenderIdSet()
        Returns:
        true if a push sender id has been prvided and push is enabled.

      • getPushSenderId

        public java.lang.String getPushSenderId()
        Returns:

      • getBuilder
